result: Amazon's valuation appears reasonable with a forward P/E of 22.6, suggesting investors anticipate future earnings growth, though its trailing P/E of 29.3 indicates a higher current valuation. The company demonstrates strong financial health with a healthy Return on Equity of 22.3% and a solid Profit Margin of 10.8%, while its Debt to Equity ratio of 43.4% is manageable for a company of its scale.
